argumentText:
ARGUMENT
w

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lshpset.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lshpset.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lshpset.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lshpset.h | |- H = ( LSHyp ` W ) |
| 5 |  | #P_elex | |- ( W e. X -> W e. _V ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( w = W -> ( LSubSp ` w ) = ( LSubSp ` W ) ) |
| 7 | 6, 3 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( w = W -> ( LSubSp ` w ) = S ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( w = W -> ( Base ` w ) = ( Base ` W ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( w = W -> ( Base ` w ) = V ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_neeq2d | |- ( w = W -> ( s =/= ( Base ` w ) <-> s =/= V ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( w = W -> ( LSpan ` w ) = ( LSpan ` W ) ) |
| 12 | 11, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( w = W -> ( LSpan ` w ) = N ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( w = W -> ( ( LSpan ` w ) ` ( s u. { v } ) ) = ( N ` ( s u. { v } ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13, 9 | #P_eqeq12d | |- ( w = W -> ( ( ( LSpan ` w ) ` ( s u. { v } ) ) = ( Base ` w ) <-> ( N ` ( s u. { v } ) ) = V ) ) |
| 15 | 9, 14 | #P_rexeqbidv | |- ( w = W -> ( E. v e. ( Base ` w ) ( ( LSpan ` w ) ` ( s u. { v } ) ) = ( Base ` w ) <-> E. v e. V ( N ` ( s u. { v } ) ) = V ) ) |
| 16 | 10, 15 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( w = W -> ( ( s =/= ( Base ` w ) /\ E. v e. ( Base ` w ) ( ( LSpan ` w ) ` ( s u. { v } ) ) = ( Base ` w ) ) <-> ( s =/= V /\ E. v e. V ( N ` ( s u. { v } ) ) = V ) ) ) |
| 17 | 7, 16 | #P_rabeqbidv | |- ( w = W -> { s e. ( LSubSp ` w ) | ( s =/= ( Base ` w ) /\ E. v e. ( Base ` w ) ( ( LSpan ` w ) ` ( s u. { v } ) ) = ( Base ` w ) ) } = { s e. S | ( s =/= V /\ E. v e. V ( N ` ( s u. { v } ) ) = V ) } ) |
| 18 |  | #P_df-lshyp | |- LSHyp = ( w e. _V |-> { s e. ( LSubSp ` w ) | ( s =/= ( Base ` w ) /\ E. v e. ( Base ` w ) ( ( LSpan ` w ) ` ( s u. { v } ) ) = ( Base ` w ) ) } ) |
| 19 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( LSubSp ` W ) e. _V |
| 20 | 3, 19 | #P_eqeltri | |- S e. _V |
| 21 | 20 | #P_rabex | |- { s e. S | ( s =/= V /\ E. v e. V ( N ` ( s u. { v } ) ) = V ) } e. _V |
| 22 | 17, 18, 21 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( W e. _V -> ( LSHyp ` W ) = { s e. S | ( s =/= V /\ E. v e. V ( N ` ( s u. { v } ) ) = V ) } ) |
| 23 | 5, 22 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. X -> ( LSHyp ` W ) = { s e. S | ( s =/= V /\ E. v e. V ( N ` ( s u. { v } ) ) = V ) } ) |
| 24 | 4, 23 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( W e. X -> H = { s e. S | ( s =/= V /\ E. v e. V ( N ` ( s u. { v } ) ) = V ) } ) |
